title: Tiny Adventures
description:
When travel photographer Erin Sullivan is forced to stay at home, she finds a way to continue exploring without leaving her apartment.

Follow Erin Outdoors on Instagram, Twitter, and online

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--

Support us by supporting our sponsors!

Vizzy — Try all four flavors https://www.vizzyhardseltzer.com/
